titles.title: To amend the provision of law establishing the Presidential 9/11 Heroes Medals of Valor to make certain technical corrections to carry out the intent of the provision.
To amend the provision of law establishing the Presidential 9/11 Heroes Medals of Valor to make certain technical corrections to carry out the intent of the provision.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: Amends federal law establishing the Presidential 9/11 Heroes Medals of Valor to: (1) instruct the Attorney General to make the necessary arrangements for striking such Medals (current law includes the efforts of the Secretary of the Treasury in such directive); and (2) revoke the status of such Medals as national medals.
